content: get ready to crochet a cozy and stylish luna beanie with this intermediate-level pattern the luna beanie is a versatile design available in sizes for adults children and even infants making it a perfect project for the whole family this pattern includes detailed instructions for crocheting in the round working top-down incorporating front/back post stitches cables and more whether you re a seasoned crocheter or looking to expand your skills the luna beanie pattern offers a fun and rewarding challenge with clear written instructions and the option for a video tutorial you ll feel supported every step of the way customize your luna beanie by choosing your favorite colors in the recommended brava worsted yarn from knit picks and showcase your crochet talents with this trendy accessory **unique features-** available in various sizes from adult to 0-6 months features front/back post stitch and cable motifs written pattern with the option for a video tutorial constructed in the round and top-down for seamless finishing materials needed- yarn brava worsted by knit picks worsted 9 wpi - 65-133 yards 59 44-121 62 meters required hook 5 mm us size h-8 gauges gauge 15 stitches and 8 row = 4 inches in double_crochet
